metadata.subject: Strange Bedfellows: Culture, Meet Science/Science, Meet Culture

relationships.description: Krauss created and led the Origins Project at Arizona State University
Krauss will moderate discussions between cultural icons and scientists

transactions: Budget allocation for filming, venues, transportation, fees, and production costs

analysis.purpose: To propose a new series called 'Strange Bedfellows' that brings together cultural icons and scientists for moderated discussions
analysis.significance: Shows planning for a high-profile series with notable participants including celebrities, scientists, and former President Barack Obama

notable_quotes: "The series will bring together cultural icons, celebrities, movie stars, directors, writers and musicians with famous scientists to talk about commonalities and differences."
"Each episode will be shot in a beautiful location in a different city around the world."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail, coercion, or pressure tactics present in this promotional document

illegal_activity.description: Document is a legitimate proposal for an educational/media series with no illegal activity discussed

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a promotional proposal for a public-facing media series featuring high-profile individuals

analysis.summary: This document is a proposal for 'Strange Bedfellows,' a series that would pair cultural celebrities with prominent scientists for moderated discussions, with a detailed budget of $6 million for 12 episodes and notable participants including Barack Obama, Johnny Depp, and various Nobel laureates.
